remarks: A stronger version of ~ gsumpropd if at least one of the involved structures is a magma, see ~ gsumpropd2 .  (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2020.)
statement:
gsummgmpropd.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
gsummgmpropd.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. W ) $.
gsummgmpropd.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. X ) $.
gsummgmpropd.b $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` H ) ) $.
gsummgmpropd.m $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mgm ) $.
gsummgmpropd.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( s e. ( Base ` G ) /\ t e. ( Base ` G ) ) ) -> ( s ( +g ` G ) t ) = ( s ( +g ` H ) t ) ) $.
gsummgmpropd.n $e |- ( ph -> Fun F ) $.
gsummgmpropd.r $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Base ` G ) ) $.
gsummgmpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( H gsum F ) ) $.
$d F s t $.
$d G s t $.
$d H s t $.
$d ph s t $.
